statements: SELECT * FROM risk_data WHERE likelihood > 50
SELECT risk_id, risk_description FROM risk_data WHERE category = 'Financial'
SELECT * FROM risk_data WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY impact DESC
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS num_of_risks FROM risk_data GROUP BY category
SELECT risk_id, risk_description, likelihood * impact AS risk_score FROM risk_data
SELECT * FROM risk_data WHERE status='Open' ORDER BY risk_id DESC;
SELECT risk_description, category, likelihood FROM risk_data WHERE category='Financial' ORDER BY likelihood ASC;
SELECT risk_description, category, impact FROM risk_data WHERE likelihood > 5 AND impact < 4 ORDER BY category, risk_id;
SELECT risk_id, risk_description, likelihood, impact FROM risk_data WHERE status='Closed' ORDER BY impact DESC, likelihood ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM risk_data WHERE status='Open';
SELECT * FROM RiskData;
SELECT risk_description, risk_category FROM RiskData ORDER BY risk_category ASC;
SELECT risk_description, risk_category FROM RiskData WHERE risk_category='Cyber Security';
SELECT * FROM IssueData WHERE issue_status='Open';
SELECT issue_description, issue_category FROM IssueData ORDER BY issue_description DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskData WHERE risk_id = 1;
SELECT risk_description, risk_category FROM RiskData WHERE risk_status = 'Active';
SELECT risk_id, risk_description, risk_category, risk_status FROM RiskData WHERE risk_description LIKE '%cyber%';
SELECT * FROM IssueData WHERE issue_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT issue_description, issue_category FROM IssueData WHERE issue_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM risk_data;
SELECT risk_name, risk_category FROM risk_data WHERE risk_status = 'Open';
SELECT risk_description, created_date FROM risk_data WHERE risk_category = 'Financial';
SELECT risk_owner, created_date FROM risk_data WHERE risk_status = 'Closed';
SELECT risk_name, risk_owner, created_date FROM risk_data ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT risk_id, risk_name FROM risk_data WHERE risk_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM risk_data WHERE risk_owner = 'John Doe' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_risks, risk_category FROM risk_data GROUP BY risk_category HAVING total_risks > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT risk_owner FROM risk_data WHERE risk_category = 'Financial' ORDER BY risk_owner ASC;
SELECT risk_name, issue_name FROM risk_data INNER JOIN issue_data ON risk_data.risk_id = issue_data.issue_id WHERE risk_data.risk_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM risks;
SELECT risk_id, risk_description FROM risks WHERE risk_category = 'Financial';
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM projects ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT issue_description, issue_priority, issue_status FROM issues WHERE issue_priority > 3;
SELECT project_name, project_manager, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM projects WHERE project_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM risks WHERE risk_category = 'Financial' ORDER BY risk_probability DESC;
SELECT risk_description, risk_probability FROM risks WHERE risk_status = 'Active';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS num_risks FROM projects INNER JOIN project_risks ON projects.project_id = project_risks.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, project_manager, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM projects ORDER BY project_end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM issues WHERE issue_status = 'Open' AND issue_priority > 3 ORDER BY issue_priority ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskCategories;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM RiskCategories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProjectRisks WHERE risk_likelihood > 3 AND risk_impact > 2;
SELECT risk_id, risk_description, risk_likelihood, risk_impact FROM ProjectRisks WHERE project_id = 5;
SELECT issue_description, issue_status, issue_owner FROM IssueLog WHERE issue_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM RiskCategories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, risk_description, risk_likelihood FROM ProjectRisks WHERE risk_likelihood > 3;
SELECT mitigation_plan, mitigation_owner FROM RiskMitigation WHERE mitigation_status = 'in progress';
SELECT analysis_date, risk_probability, risk_consequence FROM RiskAnalysis WHERE risk_probability > 0.5 AND risk_consequence > 0.3 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT issue_description, issue_owner, issue_status FROM IssueLog WHERE issue_status = 'open';
